title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Designing Collaborative Mathematics Learning in 3D Virtual Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design collaborative problem-solving strategies for mathematics using avatars in a 3D virtual environment.
Learners can simulate the process of solving geometric problems by utilizing collaborative tools (shared whiteboards, 3D object manipulation, etc.) within a virtual space.
Learners can propose improvements for virtual collaborative learning activities based on peer evaluation and feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
